title: Memory Completeness Contract v1
description: Defines required fields and validation rules for all Observation objects in MAAP (Memory as a Product)

id.description: Unique identifier for the observation (e.g., '25467' or 25467)

content.description: Core content of the observation, must not be empty or whitespace-only

session_id.description: Session identifier, traceable to a specific conversation session

source_prompt_id.description: ID of the source prompt/message that triggered this observation

entities.description: Entity tags for association and retrieval, must contain at least 1 element

timestamp.description: Observation creation time in ISO8601 format (e.g., '2026-02-08T12:30:45.000Z')

integrity_status.description: Integrity verification status. Must be VERIFIED or REJECTED, never PENDING or UNKNOWN

governance_reason.description: Governance reason or rejection explanation. REQUIRED if integrity_status='REJECTED'

legacy_status.description: Legacy status marker for pre-contract observations. Optional field.

observation_type.description: Classification of observation type (e.g., 'discovery', 'decision', 'bugfix'). Optional field.

context_timeline.description: Optional context timeline with before/current/after sections
